Reviews.Title: “Mixed feelings”
Reviews.Author: Agimar
Reviews.Content: returned trip dubai booked airmiles hotel flight free mention im wed pick hotel pay cost airmiles 4 nights town appealed hotel bad ones heres attempt summary bad news bad originally allocated 615 6th floor lovely view creek etc butit smelled bit condition bathroom expected 3 hotel whatever means mould dirt true form bathroom flooded day stay moved 614 literally door improvement cleaner bathroom deeper bath tub bad smell closing balcony door involved bit wrestling cramped breakfast nights italian restaurant hotel totally geared towards russian clientelle bit clash decor dated tired dont expect bells whistles taxis provided hotel rip main street hail taxi 5 flat half price al family hotels youre returning taxi driver mix al palace deira al hotel corner road al road entrance easily spotted main road hard bed staff friendly welcoming helpful feel home minute walk central location walking distance creek gold spice souks heart shopping district lot hustle bustle noise background cant hear shut balcony door clean bed linen free internet lobby breakfast selection fantastic cook eggsomelettes liking vast selection hotcold cheeses meats snacks stuffed peppers unfortunately dont names cereals yoghurts fresh fruit cakes breads croissants juices tea coffee etc honest weve stayed hotels breakfast selection topped didnt fight seat morning mind day overslept staff obliging bring breakfast upstairs extra cost maybe morning original flooded drink pub upstairs served bowl popcorn bowl peanuts times additional plate olives carrot crudites finish snacks replenished book thats meal hair dryer supplied demand smoke balcony anyway strangely ashtray emptied unless weve ourselves average experience terms hotel stands mind breakfast selection im foodie definitely dubai

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel close to the souks”
Reviews.Author: angela7
Reviews.Content: stayed al hotel usual absolutely perfect stopover close souks walk five ten minutes staff absolutely lovely pleasant doormen keen help carry luggage tip pleasant anyway girls reception thank irene staff restaurant excellent breakfast included price times menu particularly lamb chops pizzas wonderful price travelled safe welcoming hotel swimming pool business people shopping thank al hotel wonderful hospitality

Reviews.Title: “close to souks and good value”
Reviews.Author: angela7
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel time staff extremely pleasant deal thank irene breakfast feed army fresh rolls fruit omelettes etc adequate balcony views creek minuites walk hotel close souks walking distance ten minutes markets tourist hotel pool shopping dubai little corner reflexology massage ladies serve italian food little restaurant lovely chocolate cake thank chef value money considering outrageous prices hotels charge dubai thank al

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel for DSF shopping!”
Reviews.Author: Limonchik
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 weeks shopping festival located square shopping paradise former soviet union shoppers electronics cheap clothes leather cheapest prices world 10 minutes walk metro station taxis hotel staff nice prolonged stay overbooked price double single valentines day decorated lobby restaurant outside baloons hearts couples unexpected neat nice stay definitely stay pay sleeping storing purchases save internet wifi free hotel unlike price range

HotelInfo.Name: Al Khaleej Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Al Nasser Square | PO Box 10559, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
